formDetails.heading: About the Event

formDetails.bulletPointsHeading: In this Fireside Chat, we’ll be discussing:

formDetails.heading: About the Host
formDetails.description: Tushar Khurana co-founded Perfora, a modern oral care brand, in 2021 . His expertise lies in business planning, retail strategy, and operations management, honed through experience in health, FMCG, and hospitality industries. Prior to Perfora, he was part of the business expansion team at Cult.fit. Perfora, under his leadership, offers innovative products like electric toothbrushes, probiotic mouthwash, and smart flossers, and operates under Chipper Consumer Pvt Ltd. The brand, based in Gurugram, India, has successfully reached consumers in 26 Indian states and continues to grow.

email.emailTitle: MasterClass with Sadhan K. Bhattacharya,  a Career Coach with 30 years of Experience and Founder at WhaleDone Learning
email.emailerSubject: Registration Confirmation for PGP Rise MasterClass | Career coaching as a Catalyst for Professional Growth
email.emailDescription: We will also send a reminder to you closer to the start of the event.

bulletPoints.text: Core Principles of Career Coaching: An overview of what career coaching involves, differentiating it from other forms of professional guidance, with a focus on its relevance for experienced professionals.

Common Myths & Benefits: Addressing and debuking common misconceptions around Career Coaching followed by a focused discussion on how career coaching can aid in career advancement, navigating transitions, and addressing challenges unique to seasoned professionals.
Success Stories and Impact Analysis: Real-world examples demonstrating the effectiveness of career coaching in enhancing career trajectories for professionals in similar stages.

formDetails.heading: About the MasterClass
formDetails.description: Masters’ Union is hosting a live MasterClass for PGP Rise with Sadhan K. Bhattacharya, an acclaimed Learning and leadership Development expert with 30 years of experience and the Founder of WhaleDone Learning
formDetails.bulletPointsHeading: In this MasterClass, he will be talking about:

formDetails.description: Join us for an Interactive MasterClass and learn how Career coaching can help you advance in your career.

formDetails.heading: About the Host
formDetails.description: With over three decades of experience in business leadership and organizational development, Sadhan has been a transformative force in various institutions, including Johnson & Johnson MedTech. As the Founder of WhaleDone! Learning, he has been instrumental in shaping L&D organizations and cultivating a culture of coaching and mentorship. Sadhan's experience as a visiting faculty at ISB, IIM, and GIM, along with his knowledge as an upcoming author, allows him to share a wide range of knowledge and effective strategies. His experience and teaching make him a valuable mentor for anyone looking to advance in their professional life.

title: Career coaching as a Catalyst for Growth

email.emailTitle: MasterClass with Vivek Shivaswamy, Founding Member and head of Product @Stealth Startup
email.emailerSubject: Registration Confirmation for PGP Rise MasterClass | How to transition into Product Management
email.emailDescription: We will also send a reminder to you closer to the start of the event.

bulletPoints.text: Bridging the Technological Skill Gap: How to learn the basic skills essential for product management roles, such as understanding product development cycles, technical terminology, and communicating effectively with technical teams.
Leveraging Your Existing Skill Set: How project management, customer service, problem-solving, communication, and leadership skills can be easily leveraged to secure a product management role.

Building a Portfolio & Cracking Interviews: The importance of having a product portfolio with case studies and an understanding of product design questions, strategy questions, and customer understanding to secure a job as a product manager.

formDetails.heading: About the MasterClass
formDetails.description: Masters’ Union is hosting a live MasterClass for PGP Rise with Vivek Shivaswamy, an angel investor who is also a founding member & the head of product at a stealth startup.
formDetails.bulletPointsHeading: In this MasterClass, he will be talking about:

formDetails.heading: About the Host
formDetails.description: Vivek is a seasoned Product Professional with a decade of experience in Consumer (IoT, Edtech) and B2B (SaaS, HR-Tech) sectors, currently leading as Head of Product at a stealth startup. His career includes impactful roles at HireRight, Samsung, and Microsoft, and he's an alumnus of IIM Bangalore and NITK Surathkal. Beyond corporate roles, he co-founded HeyPM, a Product Community and is also an active Angel Investor in over 15 startups. A recognized LinkedIn content creator, Vivek was part of the inaugural 'LinkedIn Creator Accelerator Program in India'. His multifaceted expertise spans teaching, consulting for startups, and sharing insights as a digital influencer.

title: How to Transition into Product Management

title: Masterclass for the UG Programme
details:
About the Event

Did you know that 7 out of 10 new products fail to deliver on expectations? Have you heard the story of CNN+ and how they lost $300 Million in just 32 days? The broad reason for these failures can be attributed to the lack of conducting experiments and prototypes before spending the big bucks. Learn simple, inexpensive techniques and get hands-on experience running experiments and creating digital prototypes to test your business idea.


In this MasterClass, Mr. Kar will be talking about:

  • The concept behind "Fail Fast. Fail Cheap"

  • Understand how Business/Product Design and Testing business ideas go hand-in-hand

  • Understanding the concept of MVP - Minimum Viable Product and its importance

  • The prerequisites of a Product-Market fit

About the Master

Mr. Subodh Kar is a Product Leader whose expertise lies in building and scaling global products in the energy management space. He is currently leading growth for one of the flagship digital product revolutionising motor management companies, Schneider Electric and has previously led development and growth of automation products in the paper and pulp industry at Honeywell. He is also a two-time recipient of the Exemplary Coach Award from the Institute of Product Leadership.

Who is this event for?

High school students interested in pursuing tech & business management programmes.

About the Programme

The Undergraduate Programme in Technology & Business Management by Masters’ Union is a 4-year experiential programme taught by CXOs at top companies & faculty who teach at Harvard & Oxford. The programme aims to equip students with new-age specializations with year-long industry training & internship.
description: Masters’ Union brings to you a thrilling opportunity to learn Fundamentals of Prototyping. Learn simple, inexpensive techniques and get hands-on experience running experiments and creating digital prototypes to test your business idea with Mr. Subodh Kar, Sr. Product Manager at Schneider Electric.

Are you interested in becoming a Leader? Do you think you have the skills and qualities that are required to lead a team? If yes, then join us for an upcoming UG MasterClass on Leadership and Corporate Strategy. Learn from practical application of concepts you may have read in books and build on your skillset.


Mr. Rajnish Virmani is the CIO Advisor for Zoom India and Managing Partner for Positive Momentum Limited. He will be sharing his vast knowledge and experience on how leadership plays a pivotal role in reshaping the career of any individual.


In this MasterClass, Mr. Virmani will be talking about:

  • Corporate vision and strategies that assist in becoming a future leader

Mr. Rajnish Virmani is a senior leader who has led large global teams in operations, management, technology and leadership development. He is currently a CIO Advisor for Zoom India and Managing Partner for Positive Momentum Limited. He has previously worked with American Express for over 16 years as a Centre Head. title: UG Campus Tour and Information Session
details:
About the Event

Masters’ Union is organising a Campus Tour for all the high-school students planning to enroll in tech & business management programmes.


If you’re in or around Delhi NCR, join us for a candid conversation with the Director of the UG Programme.


Here’s what you can expect:

  • An inside scoop on the admissions, student life, academics & placement experiences

  • How personalised coaching & hands-on modules can help you stay industry ready from day 1

  • Networking with like-minded folks who’re looking to step into college


About the Host

With over 10 years of experience working in consulting & ed-tech, Swati Ganeti has worked with organisations like Bain & Company and founded SoftClay Technology. An IIT-D & Wharton Alumna, Swati is currently the Director of the Undergraduate Programme at Masters’ Union.

Who’s this for you?

  • 12th-class students interested in pursuing tech & business management programmes.

  • Parents who’re looking to get their children enrolled in tech & business management programmes.

About the Programme

The Undergraduate Programme in Technology & Business Management by Masters’ Union is a 4-year experiential programme taught by CXOs at top companies & faculty who teach at Harvard & Oxford. The programme aims to equip students with new-age specialisations with year-long industry training & internship .
description: Join us at the Masters’ Union Campus in Gurugram to know more about the Undergraduate Programme and interact with the Masters’ Union Undergraduate team. Open to applicants, potential applicants, and their parents.

email.emailTitle: Thank you for expressing an interest in MasterClass for UG Programme by Masters’ Union

title: MasterClass for the UG Programme
details:
About the Event

Masters’ Union is hosting a live MasterClass with Siddarth Padmanabhan - Co-Founder, Neowise Technologies.


With the power to reach millions of people with a single post, social media marketing has quickly become one of the most effective tools for businesses looking to build their brand and increase sales.


In this MasterClass, Siddarth will be talking about:

  • Basics of Digital and Social Media Marketing in an easy-to-understand manner

  • Key trends in Digital and Social Media Marketing in 2023

  • Case studies from successful Digital, Social Media, and Influencer Marketing campaigns

About the Host

With more than 13 years of experience in digital marketing, Siddharth Padmanabhan holds expertise in building strategies through ideas & insights that drive results and revenue across business groups. He’s been an Enterprise Account Director at LinkedIn and founded organizations like Neowise Technologies & Blackcoffee Media.

Who is this for?

High school students interested in pursuing tech & business management programmes.

About the Programme

The Undergraduate Programme in Technology & Business Management by Masters’ Union is a 4-year experiential programme taught by CXOs at top companies & faculty who teach at Harvard & Oxford. The programme aims to equip students with new-age specializations with year-long industry training & internship.
description: Join us for an insightful session on Digital Marketing to learn how social media channels can be used to drive sales and integration of new techniques like artificial intelligence.

title: MasterClass for the UG Programme
details:

Masters’ Union is hosting a live MasterClass with Malthi Sathish, Consultant Chief Product Officer, JobsForHer.


The role of product management has become increasingly important in ensuring the success of new products. It involves understanding the market, and user needs to deliver a product that meets business objectives and customer expectations.


In this MasterClass, Malthi will be talking about:.

  • Breaking down Product Management in an easy-to-understand language

  • Step-by-step guide for the process of building a product

  • Major technological advancements in the Product space

With over 20 years of experience in developing, building, and scaling global products for Enterprise, SMB, and Platform users, Malthi Sathish is a seasoned product professional. title: MasterClass for UG Programme
details:

email.emailerSubject: Undergraduate Programme
email.emailTitle: Undergraduate Programme Hands-on Interventions Webinar

title: Undergraduate Programme Hands-on Interventions
details:
Ever felt like you could learn better if you actually applied a learning to real life? Masters’ Union Undergraduate Programme in Technology and Business Management allows you to do just that.



Come join our webinar to discuss this and get into the depths of the Experiential pedagogy employed at Masters’ Union. From hands-on interventions like the Global Immersion Programme and Leadership Retreats to the Entrepreneurship Capstone where students build their own startups, we will address all this and more.



Note: This session is open to Parents and Students of Class 12th, wanting to know more about our stellar Undergraduate Programme.
description: Come join our webinar to discuss this and get into the depths of the Experiential pedagogy employed at Masters’ Union. email.emailerSubject: Alumni Speak - Cracking Interviews at Zerodha and CRED
email.emailTitle: webinar, “Cracking Interviews at Zerodha and CRED”

title: Alumni Speak - Cracking Interviews at Zerodha and CRED
details:
As a testament to our hands-on pedagogy, Zerodha’s very first MBA hire was our student Deepankar Mathur from Cohort ‘22. Hear from Deepankar, Founder's Office, Zerodha and Khyatee Gattani, Debt Fund Raise Relationship Manager, CRED as they share their interview experiences, best practices and hacks for converting offers from leading startups.



Join the webinar to get an in-depth understanding of the Masters’ Union placement process and how we prepare and launch our students into high-growth career roles.



Note: This session is only open to applicants who are well on their way to completing their admissions applications. Registration will only be provided to applicants at this stage. If you’re at this stage, then feel free to register.

email.emailTitle: webinar “How to incubate, accelerate and deploy ideas”

title: Ideas - Incubated, Accelerated and Deployed
details:
Masters’ Union is conducting a webinar with the team of students that runs the Masters’ Union Innovation Lab! Join us to find out how this Innovation Lab supports the growth of early stage startups.



Masters’ Union Innovation Lab, known as MUIL, provides entrepreneurs with a platform to ideate, build and grow their startups by supporting them with expert mentorship and resources in various fields of business.



The philosophy of the MUIL is to work closely with entrepreneurs to build strong foundations helping them build a robust, scalable, and successful startup for tomorrow.



Note: This session is only open to applicants who are well on their way to completing their admissions applications. Links will only be provided to applicants at this stage. If you’re at this stage, then feel free to register.

email.emailerSubject: Seeking the Ideal MBA Experience
email.emailTitle: webinar Seeking the Ideal MBA Experience

title: Seeking the Ideal MBA Experience
details:
Join our students, Shivani Vaswani (offer-holder, IIM Lucknow) and Dia Goel (offer-holder, London Business School) as they take a deep dive into how to approach the MBA application process and choosing the right B-school. Learn from them as they share their tips on application essays and references and how to map program outcomes with personal career goals.



They will also be covering the unique hands-on pedagogy at Masters’ Union and why they chose our non-conventional curriculum over traditional institutions like IIM-L and LBS.



Note: This one-hour session is only open to applicants who’ve started their admissions applications. Links will only be provided to applicants at this stage. If you’ve begun or completed your application, feel free to register.

title: Growing Women Leaders at Masters’ Union
details:
Did you know that there’s only one woman to 9 men in top leadership roles?


In this session, you will find insights into how Masters’ Union is engaged in building the next cadre of women leaders in India. At Masters’ Union, we believe that we can use education as a catalyst to improve women's representation at senior levels of the hierarchy.



Know more about our commitment to gender equality and how you fit into our upcoming cohort.



Note: This one-hour session is only open to applicants who’ve started their admissions applications. Links will only be provided to applicants at this stage. If you’ve begun or completed your application, feel free to register.

title: Insights from the Student-Run Investment Fund
details:
Masters’ Union is conducting a webinar with the team of students that runs the Masters’ Union Investment Fund! Join us to find out how this student-run investment fund invests across different asset classes.



The Masters’ Union Investment Fund (MUIF) has a corpus of INR 5 crore that invests in real estate, capital markets, derivatives, stressed assets and startups, all under the guidance of Master-Mentors. The idea behind the fund is to instil portfolio management skills in students as part of the programme and offer them real-time exposure to different asset classes.

title: The Merits of a Tech- MBA
details:
Data Science, Analytics, Artificial Intelligence, Web3, IoT - these are all contemporary technologies that are changing how work is happening. At Masters’ Union, we believe that technology should be an enabler - not dissuade curious minds through its unfriendly jargon.



Whether it is sports or real estate, there is no field today where the tech muscle does not apply. Join our webinar to understand how being new to technology isn’t a limitation at Masters’ Union.

Masters’ Union Innovation Lab (“MUIL”) is focused on fostering Innovation in the young minds of India. email.emailerSubject: Fireside Talk on Principles of People Management | Rajat Mathur - MD, Morgan Stanley
email.emailTitle: Principles of People Management with Rajat Mathur
email.emailDescription:
People are critical to the success of any company. Therefore, how you attract, develop and retain them has a direct impact on your bottom line. As a discipline, people management entails the concept and underlying process of getting the absolute most out of your workforce.

Masters’ Union is excited to host a virtual fireside talk with Rajat Mathur - MD, Morgan Stanley and a Master at Masters’ Union.

During the talk, Rajat will focus on the psychology of people management and how our people-related decision-making can impact the organisation.

If you’re inclined toward people management, we invite you to join us!

email.emailerSubject: Fireside Talk on Heuristics 101 | Rakshita Shharma - Chief People Officer at Bobble AI
email.emailTitle: Heuristics 101 with Rakshita Shharma
email.emailDescription:
A heuristic is a mental shortcut that allows people to solve problems and make quick judgments. Through heuristics, one can condense complex details to simplify information, thereby reducing the time that goes into decision-making.

Masters’ Union is excited to host a virtual fireside talk with Rakshita Shharma - Chief People Officer, Bobble AI and a Master at Masters’ Union.

During the talk, Dr Rakshita will focus on some rule-of-thumb strategies that help shorten the decision-making process and allow people to function without constantly stopping to think about their next course of action.

If you’re inclined toward heuristics and decision-making, we invite you to join us!

email.emailerSubject: Fireside Talk on NLP Use Cases in Marketing | Dipayan Sarkar - Former Sr. Data Scientist at Maersk Group
email.emailTitle: NLP Use Cases in Marketing with Dipayan Sarkar
email.emailDescription:
We are surrounded by innumerable formats of textual data such as news, emails, Facebook posts, tweets, customer feedback and many more. While humans have the ability to understand this data, how can computers interpret this textual data in the best way possible?

The answer is Natural Language Processing (NLP)! NLP can not only make computers process the textual data but also comprehend human language.

Masters’ Union is excited to host a virtual fireside talk with Dipayan Sarkar - Former Sr. Data Scientist at Maersk Group and a Master at Masters’ Union.

During this interactive session, Dipayan will elaborate on how NLP can help create next-gen marketing campaigns.

If you’re inclined toward data and use cases of NLP in marketing, we invite you to join us!

email.emailerSubject: Fireside Talk on Data Storytelling | Raghavshyam Ramamurthy - Co-Founder at Wilson Consulting
email.emailTitle: Learn the Fundamentals of Data Storytelling with Raghavshyam Ramamurthy
email.emailDescription:
Can you remember your organization's last annual statement? Can you remember at least a couple of key takeaways? Probably not. Now, try to recall your favourite childhood movie. In this case, you probably remember the characters' names and the entire plot with surprising clarity. Research indicates that information communicated through stories has a 22 times more recall factor than that communicated through numbers.

Masters’ Union is excited to host a virtual fireside talk with Raghavshyam Ramamurthy - Co-Founder at Wilson Consulting and a Master at Masters’ Union.

During this interactive session, Shaam will demonstrate how to use real-life data to create visuals and develop a compelling narrative to engage the audience using Tableau. He will also walk you through the best practices and nuances to consider when presenting information to a business audience.

If you’re inclined toward data storytelling, we invite you to join us!

email.emailerSubject: Shareholder Capitalism in the Age of Outrage with Karthik Ramanna | Director, Oxford University
email.emailTitle: Exploring Shareholder Capitalism with Karthik Ramanna
email.emailDescription:
Masters’ Union is conducting a virtual fireside talk with Karthik Ramanna - Professor of Business & Public Policy and Director of the Master of Public Policy at the University of Oxford’s Blavatnik School of Government and a Founding Masters at Masters’ Union.

Prior to joining Oxford, Professor Ramanna was a faculty at Harvard Business School for nearly a decade. At Harvard, he also held the Henry B. Arthur Fellowship in ethics, the Marvin Bower Fellowship recognising innovative faculty research and a visiting fellowship at the Kennedy School of Government. He received a PhD in management from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.

During this fireside talk, you will be able to explore the ins and outs of shareholder capitalism in the age of outrage.

If you are an economics enthusiast, we invite you to join us.

details:
Masters’ Union is conducting an ‘Alumni Meet’ with our very own Ashwin Prasad from the first cohort! Join this exclusive session to interact with alumni from Masters’ Union and get an inside scoop on the student life, academics and placement experiences that they underwent at Masters’ Union!



Note: This session is only open to applicants who are well on their way to completing their admissions applications. Links will only be provided to applicants at this stage. If you’re at this stage, then feel free to register.

email.emailerSubject: Masters' Union: Fireside Talk | Elkana Ezekiel - Ex Chief Marketing Officer,Samsung Electronics
email.emailTitle: Meet the Masters: Virtual Fireside Talk with Ex-CMO at Samsung Electronics
email.emailDescription:
Masters’ Union is conducting a virtual fireside talk with Prof. Elkana Ezekiel - Former Chief Marketing Officer at Samsung Electronics.


Inspired by Spencer Johnson's bestselling seminal work and motivational business fable titled 'Who Moved My Cheese?', this talk will encapsulate impactful transformations in the Marketing world and how legacy, as well as the new-age companies, are adapting in the changing face of the marketing industry.



We invite all prospective candidates to join us.
